get.description: gets a shareable link for the specified list. If the link does not exist, it will be created.

head.description: gets a shareable link for the specified list. If the link does not exist, it will be created.

post.description: creates a shareable link for the specified list. If the link already exists, it will be returned.

delete.description: gets a shareable link for the specified list. If the link does not exist, it will be created.

post.description: creates a new list for the authenticated user. Supports specifying a team or personal list.
